GSD.product_version: versions from v5.2 to before v5.10.150
GSD.description:
misc: ocxl: fix possible refcount leak in afu_ioctl()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.150 by commit 7ba19a60c74fb0057d4daef2fa2cbfc9522f3ba1, it was introduced in version v5.2 by commit 060146614643ddc5978c73ffac0329762b4651c9. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: misc: ocxl: fix possible refcount leak in afu_ioctl()
